svg.text: Step-by-Step Guide for Golden Triangle-Aligned Peace Practices at Community Level
• Elder guidance and cultural protocol education
• Free, Prior, and Informed Consent 2.0 implementation
• Community healing assessment and trauma mapping
• Seasonal practice development and ritual integration
• Treaty mechanism education and advocacy skills
• Sacred site stewardship and land-based authority
• Future impact accountability and youth leadership
Golden Triangle Integration Throughout All Phases
🏛️ Treaty Authority: UNSC veto override education, Global Citizens' Initiative participation, Global Enforcement Mechanism liaison
🌍 Indigenous Guidance: Earth Council consultation, Traditional Knowledge integration, ceremonial stewardship development
🕸️ Meta-Gov Coordination: Cross-domain early warning, Peace Meta-Council participation, policy coherence monitoring
Circle training, Treaty education, Ceremony practice
Healing circles, BAZ participation, Youth leadership
• Youth authority in future impact assessment
Community: Pacific Northwest fishing village working with Coastal Salish Nation to address climate displacement and resource conflicts
Process: 18-month integration following this framework, from FPIC 2.0 consultation through traditional salmon ceremony governance integration
Outcomes: Zero violent conflicts (down from 12/year), 95% Indigenous consent compliance, traditional fishing protocol revival, youth-elder council authority, watershed governance participation
